Hi Steve,

I also ran into this problem yesterday on 
  - Windows XP Pro SP=
3,
  - Adobe Reader 9.1.0.

Resolved it googling for "An Introduction to He=
ritrix" and finding http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/download/attachme=
nts/5441/Mohr-et-al-2004.pdf document as the first link which looks the sam=
e as the one you've uploaded to the files section.

Would be great if the l=
ink in FAQ could be corrected.

Regards,
Sergey
